mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(seq, id, title, content, regdate, hit_cnt) VALUES (seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regdate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM art_seq, t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Board ORDER BY seq DESC) t) t2 WHERE t2.art_seq BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT t2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM art_seq, t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Board WHERE title LIKE #{title} ORDER BY seq DESC) t) t2 WHERE t2.art_seq BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT seq, id, title, content, regdate, hit_cnt FROM Board WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET hit_cnt = NVL(hit_cnt, 0) + 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
